attributes.review: This app is as a huge let down I was hoping to be inspired but when I opened it an angry man appeared on the screen calling me fat and hideously ugly. A huge 🧶 orange basketball shaped man said many rasist slurs he said is name was trumpet or something in a little hard of hearing after they literally reached threw my phone and uppercutted me and my mom. Very disappointed. ❤️💓🧚🏼‍♂️ you tried it. Now STOP 💕💝✨🧚🏽‍♀️
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: This app crashed my phone and spammed me with so many notifications and calls to action that were basically just about donating. Seriously, I’d give it zero stars if that were possible. I don’t want my location constantly tracked, I don’t want apps constantly in my wallet and in my face, and I’m extremely disappointed
attributes.title: SPAM CITY

attributes.review:
Curiosity got the best of me, and I downloaded it. Biggest mistake I’ve ever made with a phone. It all started with the app. I noticed it beginning to get glitchy. After a while, it wouldn’t even launch. Now MY PHONE IS GLITCHING AND BARELY WORKS!!!! I have to take it to the Apple Store! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU WANT YOUR PHONE TO BE DESTROYED. 

Apple, please remove this from the App Store. It’s damaging phones.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD, It broke my phone!!!!!!!

attributes.review: I do not recommend this app I can’t even function on it properly. There’s too many pop ups & there’s no way to access without your personal phone number. It’s unbelievable the amount of lies that this app shows me, it’s a whole bunch of fake news. Never download this please I swear it’s some sort of virus.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: After I downloaded this app my phone kept getting hot and crashing. I’d close all of my apps out and it would still get hot, only to see that this app was open and running in the background AFTER I KNOW I closed it out at least 3 times! WTH! I deleted it and haven’t had that problem since.
attributes.title: Suspicious activity!

attributes.review: After having a nice drink of bleach with my unseasoned chicken, I decided to take a gander downloading my favorite president’s app. Unfortunately, it took way longer to download than it took me to chug the whole jug! Can you believe that? Boy, I am a big fat patriot but This is the last straw. Our president is so ungrateful even though he ruined my crops and my country.
attributes.title: Oh no baby
